title: Diamond 3's LF team
body:
Hey guys, me and a mate are both diamond 3 mains and are looking to make or join a team.

We play adc/mid/jung between us.

If your interested or have a few spots open, add me in game. IGN: Bombur

Thanks guys.

replies.body: dont play with this scrub guys, just played with him missed every smite then raged at our kass who was carrying
heh, i used to go around with the name thorin. i should change back and we should get into the open tourneys lel.
